name: Betatester
description:
So you got position of betatester in this famous gamedev company and you are ready to test their new AAA game. Here is letter from your boss:

“Hello, so i was working on new build. I have added 2 new levels, test them, please, here, catch link of latest stable version 0.7.12.

1) Check how hard it will be to beat 1 and 2 levels

2) Test new graphic settings, performance etc waiting for report

Take care, Big Boss Jack. “ Sounds pretty easy. Your mission is getting to casino. And find all bugs that you can of course.

CONTROLS:

ESC - settings menu

WASD - movement

E - take item

LMB - drop item
